other:
The script uses SLURM to submit a job with the following options:
- Account: pc2-mitarbeiter
- Job name: scaling_daxpy_cpu
- Partition: all
- Time limit: 20 minutes
- Number of nodes: 1
- Exclusive access to the node
- Output file: scaling_daxpy_cpu_job-%A.out

The script loads the R and Julia modules and sets the JULIA_DEPOT_PATH environment variable. It then runs the scaling_daxpy_cpu.jl program with 128 threads.
